content: Packaging companies Rock-Tenn Co  and MeadWestvaco Corp  agreed to form a combined $16 billion company to take on market leader International Paper Co  in the United States and abroad.
name: International Paper Company
title: Rock-Tenn  MeadWestvaco to merge  create packaging giant

content: Packaging companies Rock-Tenn Co and MeadWestvaco Corp will combine to form a company worth $16 billion to take on market leader International Paper Co  as demand for corrugated boxes surges in North America.
name: International Paper Company
title: Packaging companies Rock-Tenn  MeadWestvaco to merge
